skills.name: Cross Attack
skills.description: Hits the enemy with an Energy blast and inflicts Continuous Damage for 3 turns with a 20% chance.

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.name: Soul Split
skills.description: Pierces the enemy's soul, disturbing the enemy's HP recovery for 2 turns, and recovering 35% HP if the enemy dies.

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns

skill_effect.name: Self-Heal
skill_effect.description: Heal that affects only the monster who cast the skill

skills.name: Bloodthirst (Passive)
skills.description: Recovers HP by 20% if you land a Critical Hit and increases your Critical Rate by 30% for the next 2 turns. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Increase CRI Rate
skill_effect.description: Critical Hit Rate is increased by 30%
